snippet: The United States Olympic Committee said Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington were candidates to host the Summer Games.
abstract: United States Olympic Committee has narrowed list of potential American cities to host the 2024 Summer Games to Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington.
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee said Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Washington were candidates to host the Summer Games.

headline.main: U.S.O.C. Narrows Bids to Four Cities
headline.print_headline: U.S.O.C. Narrows Bids to Four Cities
